    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void drawAllShapes()
      Helper function which draws out all of the shapes.
      void exportMenuBtnClick()
      Detects if the export button is pressed, if so, it exports the canvas in the BMP format.
      void fillColorPickerChange()
      Detects if the filleColor is changed, if so it is added as a PenInstuction object to the queInstructions list.
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
      Initializes the brush and line/fill colors
      void lineColorPickerChange()
      Detects if the lineColor is changed, if so it is added as a PenInstuction object to the queInstructions list.
      void newCanvasMenuBtnClick()
      Clears all shapes from the quedInstructions list, removing all shapes from the canvas.
      void openMenuBtnClick()
      Detects if the open button is pressed, if so, the user can choose to open a VEC file, drawing the shapes in the file to the canvas.
      void resizeCanvas​(java.lang.Double stageWidth, java.lang.Double stageHeight)
      Resizes the canvas and everything drawn within it, based upon the window size.
      void saveMenuBtnClick()
      Detects if the save button has been pressed and saves the current canvas to a VEC file.
      void showGridMenuBtnClick()
      Detects if the grid button is pressed, if so it show's the grid or not to the canvas.
      void showUndoHistoryMenuBtnClick()
      Detects if the undo history button has been clicked and brings up drawing history.
      void undoMenuBtnClick()
      Detects if the undo button is clicked, if so, it removes an Instruction from queInstructions list.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • newCanvasMenuBtnClick

        public void newCanvasMenuBtnClick()
        Clears all shapes from the quedInstructions list, removing all shapes from the canvas.

      • showUndoHistoryMenuBtnClick

        public void showUndoHistoryMenuBtnClick()
        Detects if the undo history button has been clicked and brings up drawing history.

      • saveMenuBtnClick

        public void saveMenuBtnClick()
        Detects if the save button has been pressed and saves the current canvas to a VEC file.

      • lineColorPickerChange

        public void lineColorPickerChange()
        Detects if the lineColor is changed, if so it is added as a PenInstuction object to the queInstructions list.

      • fillColorPickerChange

        public void fillColorPickerChange()
        Detects if the filleColor is changed, if so it is added as a PenInstuction object to the queInstructions list.

      • undoMenuBtnClick

        public void undoMenuBtnClick()
        Detects if the undo button is clicked, if so, it removes an Instruction from queInstructions list.

      • showGridMenuBtnClick

        public void showGridMenuBtnClick()
        Detects if the grid button is pressed, if so it show's the grid or not to the canvas. This also makes newly added shapes conform to the grid squares.

      • exportMenuBtnClick

        public void exportMenuBtnClick()
        Detects if the export button is pressed, if so, it exports the canvas in the BMP format.

      • openMenuBtnClick

        public void openMenuBtnClick()
        Detects if the open button is pressed, if so, the user can choose to open a VEC file, drawing the shapes in the file to the canvas.

      • resizeCanvas

                         java.lang.Double stageHeight)
        Resizes the canvas and everything drawn within it, based upon the window size.
        Parameters:

        stageHeight -

        Helper function which draws out all of the shapes.
